title: Associate a certain Champion Quirk with the personality of that champion's main
body:
Like;

Vel'Koz mains are all huge nerds and excel at geometry

Bard Mains are suckers for Studio Ghibli films and have an own Zen garden

Mordekaiser Mains are Masochists due to his health costs and general affliction to pain and referencing these kinds of tendencies

replies.body:
{{champion:37}}  mains like to listen to music

(i dont listen enough to it tho, but i enjoy it.)

{{champion:103}}  mains are good in arithmetic
{{champion:30}}  mains are like "to press R, or not to press R"
{{champion:82}}  mains love oxygen, because it completes the electrons of the iron.

and finally, rubick mains are fake, which means that they are as strong as faker(i felt forced to do this joke)
I don't get the Ahri one
All Sion mains want to break the face of their enemy.
Singed mains can dodge everything exceptionally well.
